Chapter 2343 - Chapter 2343: Inviting You Into The Weng Gongyang Mountain (3)

Chapter 2343: Inviting You Into the Weng Gongyang Mountain (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

It was clearly the same person from before!

However, her every frown and laugh had completely changed!

If he hadn’t seen it with his own eyes, Xu Xiaoshou wouldn’t have believed that the girl in front of him was actually an old auntie.

“Make-up.”

Aunt Xiang stood up and walked over. Her figure was still slim, but her chest had clearly been bound, and her silhouette was much more slender.

Like a butterfly, she grabbed the hem of her green dress and twirled around. She asked him eagerly, “How is it? You can’t recognize me, right?”

Xu Xiaoshou felt his vision turn black.

“What about this?” Aunt Xiang pinched herself and her voice changed and she looked like an 18 -year-old girl.

Xu Xiaoshou no longer believed that ‘seeing was believing’.

This was comparable to the ‘Transformation’ of a Holy Emperor!

Were all professional intelligence agents so strong? One person with two faces, just like Old Man Li?

“My name is Xiangxiang now. I’m an Innate Stage trial-taker. I’ll enter the Four Symbols Secret Realm in an hour’s time.”

“I’ve suppressed my strength. I’ll soon break through to the Sovereign Dao Realm regardless of the consequences just to get a good ranking in the Holy Palace Trial.”

“I can’t show up during the entire operation. I can only help you do an analysis on a spiritual level. Maybe you don’t need it, but it’s better than nothing.”

“Unless you are in a dire situation where death is imminent, you cannot summon me.”

Aunt Xiang recounted everything in detail. As she spoke, she took out a star diamond ear stud from the wooden box on the table.

She turned around and handed the earring over to him. “Contact me through this thing. Crush it if you think you’re in danger of dying and I’ll summon The

Divine to save you.”

After a pause, the girl’s eyes became extremely solemn, and her tone became a little more respectful.

“I only have one warning.”

“No matter what, do not underestimate Elder Dao the Flamboyant!”

Xu Xiaoshou took the star diamond earring. It was small and inconspicuous, but it was as heavy as a rock.

Why did everyone exert so much pressure on him?

Was Dao Qiongcang really that strong?

“I’ll remember it.”

He transformed back into Xu Xiaoshou and put the earring on his earlobe. The earring was small and not obvious.

He did not need Aunt Xiang to explain, he instantly understood the use of the ear stud.

It did not even need any spiritual source. It could absorb a little of the Heaven and Earth spiritual energy on its own to maintain its communication function.

“What an exquisite Divine Secrets Shield technique. It’s obvious that it’s a protection against Elder Dao. Is there anyone in your Xiang family who can make this?” Xu Xiaoshou touched his earlobe and asked with a smile. “It’s Patriarch Wuji’s masterpiece.” the teenage Aunt Xiang shrugged.

Xu Xiaoshou’s smile disappeared.

Was it really that serious?

Even an earring had to be produced by Xuan Wuji. I can make one too!

“I have to go. Otherwise, I won’t be able to catch up to the mainstream. I’m a real Eight Classics trial-taker. I have a card.” Aunt Xiang flashed her trial-taker token with a cute expression.

Xu Xiaoshou couldn’t believe that simple makeup could achieve this effect. Perhaps this was the simplest way to the Great Path. He waved his hand and said, “Go!”

“What about you?” Aunt Xiang asked before she left.

“I’m a stowaway. It doesn’t matter.” Xu Xiaoshou put away the paper fan and pulled at his original face and grimaced.

If they were discovered on this trip, their whereabouts would be exposed.

If he was not discovered, he would not be discovered no matter whose face he wore.

Xu Gusheng’s clone didn’t have much time left to live, and Dao Qiongcang had forcibly shortened his lifespan by more than ten days. Now, he could end his mission.

Xu Xiaoshou calculated carefully and realized that he was used to being Zhou Tianshen, Xiao Shi Tan Ji and Chen Shu…

He had become many other people, but it had been a long time since he had been himself.

“Xu Xiaoshou’s face shouldn’t be that ugly, right?” Xu Xiaoshou touched his cheeks and smiled at himself.

“Maybe.” The young girl Xiangxiang smiled and cupped her fists. “Take care.”

“Take care.” Xu Xiaoshou replied.

With a bang amid a blossom of fragrance, Xiangxiang disappeared.

The smile on Xu Xiaoshou’s face also disappeared, and his eyes became extremely solemn.

He didn’t have time to make any more preparations. He had to take the plunge.

Fortunately, the biggest preparations had already ended, and the people who should enter the Four Symbols Secret Realm had already arrived.

The rest would be left to the future!

“Xiao Han.”

He muttered in a low voice and the Little Frost Ferret appeared out of nowhere and crawled into his clothes.

“Feng Yujin?”

He raised his eyes and looked at the beam. The gray fog that had appeared at some point in time descended and turned into a woman in white.

The snow was reflected outside the window, and the woman smiled calmly, like an orchid in the empty valley.

She held her small bronze cauldron and nodded.

“Xu Xiaoshou, long time no see.”

With a sizzle, the gray mist behind MO MO condensed into a ghastly face that bared its fangs and brandished its claws.

Feng Yujin’s voice rang out from MO MO Mo’s throat. She laughed in a sinister manner and there was a hint of coldness in her voice.

“Xu Xiaoshou, when the Tianxuan Gate couldn’t even kill you, I knew that you would be extraordinary.”

“But I really didn’t expect you to reach such heights so quickly.”

Xu Xiao ignored Feng Yujin and waved at MO Mo.

“Junior Sister MO, long time no see, but it hasn’t been that long, just a month or so.”

MO MO nodded and turned to look at the white snow outside the window.

“A month? She’s…

“Shut up.”

Before Feng Yujin could finish his sentence, MO MO cut him off.

What kind of situation were these two people in, could they get along harmoniously? Xu Xiaoshou was bewildered, but he didn’t ask further.

Feng Yujin had volunteered to come here because of Bazhun’an’s threat. There was no need to expose his shortcomings at this time.

The Space Dao Disc spun under his feet and Xu Xiaoshou reached out his hand.

“I’m going to teleport. Don’t resist.”

“Alright.”

MO MO reached out her hand and gently placed it on his palm. Her palm must have touched the snowflakes outside the window just now. It was cold and wet.

Xu Xiaoshou held her hand. After a pause, he shouted.

“Big! Space! Time! Move! Shift!”
